long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a button "Mark as Replied" to every Craigslist posting you see.
If you click it then the next time you search for the postings the one marked will have a REPLIED label in front of the link in the search list.
That way you can keep a record of not only what postings you've seen but what you've actually replied to.
